titles.title: A concurrent resolution directing the Secretary of the Senate to make corrections in the enrollment of the bill S. 1605.
A concurrent resolution directing the Secretary of the Senate to make corrections in the enrollment of the bill S. 1605.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Without objection, the Chair laid before the House S. Con. Res. 24.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution directs the Secretary of the Senate to make corrections in the enrollment of S. 1605 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022) to amend amounts relating to the Eielson Air Force Base and AEGIS Ashore Barracks Planning and Design in Redzikowo, Poland.
